text: Lothar Späth (16 November 1937 – 18 March 2016) was a German politician of the CDU.Lothar Späth ist tot From 30 August 1978 to 13 January 1991, Späth was the 5th Minister President of Baden-Württemberg and chairman of the CDU Baden- Württemberg. He served as the 36th President of the Bundesrat in the 1980s. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany Category:Ministers-President of Baden-Württemberg
title: Lothar Späth
